edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model

Class ActivityList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model.ActivityList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tabular, java.util.Observer

    public class ActivityList
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, Tabular
    ActivityList is both OBSERVABLE by GetOutdoorsManager and an OBSERVER of Activity. ActivityList also implements the Tabular interface to output its data as an array for easy display via the UI classes.
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActivityList()
      Constructs an empty ActivityList with default name "Activities".

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActivityList

        public ActivityList()
        Constructs an empty ActivityList with default name "Activities". Observers of ActivityList are notified of construction.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the ActivityList.
        Returns:
        the name

      • addActivity

        public boolean addActivity(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           boolean needSnow,
                           int snowBoundary)
        Adds an Activity to the list if it is not already on the list. Auto generates a unique ID for the Activity. Observers of ActivityList are notified of the change
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Activity
        description - the description of the Activity
        needSnow - whether or not snow is needed for the activity
        snowBoundary - the snow boundary for the Activity
        Returns:
        true if the Activity was added successfully, false otherwise i.e. the Activity was already on the list

      • getActivityAt

        public Activity getActivityAt(int index)
        Gets an Activity at a specified index in the list
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Activity to get
        Returns:
        the Activity at the specified index
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the specified index is not between 0 and size - 1

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets the number of Activities in the list
        Returns:
        the size of the list

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the list is empty i.e. there are no Activities in the list
        Returns:
        true if there are no Activities in the list, false otherwise

      • get2DArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] get2DArray()
        Generates a 2D array containing the data for all Activities in the list. Each row corresponds to an individual Activity. The first column corresponds to ID, the second name, the third description, the fourth whether or not snow is needed, and the fifth the snow boundary.
        Specified by:
        get2DArray in interface Tabular
        Returns:
        a 2D object array containing the data for all Activities in the list

      • indexOfID

        public int indexOfID(java.lang.String id)
        Gets the index of an Activity specified by its ID in the list.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the Activity to find
        Returns:
        the index if an Activity with the ID is found, or -1 if no Activity with the specified ID exists

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Notifies observers of ActivityList when a change is made
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - an observable, in this case an Activity
        arg - an observer, in this case GetOutdoorsManager
